      • assignField

        public static void assignField(java.lang.Object target,
                               java.lang.reflect.Method mutatorMethod,
                               java.lang.Object value,
                               java.lang.Boolean throwException)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the field via the setter optionally converting teh value from String or another compatible class if such constructor exists.
        Parameters:
        target - the bean
        mutatorMethod - setter
        value - field value - can be String for Dates and numbers
        throwException - throw an exception or swallow it on errors
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • assignField

        public static void assignField(java.lang.Object target,
                               java.lang.reflect.Method mutatorMethod,
                               java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the field via the setter optionally converting teh value from String or another compatible class if such constructor exists. Swallows conversion errors.
        Parameters:
        target - the bean
        mutatorMethod - setter
        value - field value - can be String for Dates and numbers
